Marius Weyers (a mụrụ na 3 Febụwarị 1945, na Johannesburg) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa. Ya na nwunye ya Yvette, onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, bi na Rooi-Els na Western Cape
Ọ natara nlebara anya mba ụwa na-eme Andrew Steyn, onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-eme ihe nkiri The Gods Must Be Crazy (1980). Ọ pụtara na Blood Diamond (2006).
